section.title: Date
section.para: These variables control how the date is displayed. The default is ISO 8601 formatting.

Please refer to the
PHP manual for details on available formatting options.

listitem.para: This format is used in the bug listing pages (eg: View Bugs). Default is Y-m-d.
This format is used in the view/update bug pages, bug notes, manage section, and news section. Datetime picker widget uses this format for displaying or editing dateime values. Default is Y-m-d H:i.
This format is used on the top of each page (current time) and the emails that are sent out. Default is Y-m-d H:i T.
